short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ragdoll Hit: Unleash your aim! Knock down ragdolls with precision throws in this addictive, quick-play physics game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In Ragdoll Hit, you have to get rid of ragdoll characters by throwing precision objects with their aim to knock them down. Ragdoll hit is a funny and fun physics game. The task of each level is different, so you have to make good angle, power and timing to hit targets. The game has straightforward mechanics that are quick to learn, but will keep you coming back with a good challenge and some food for thought on your way through increasingly complex levels.

Every level has different obstacles and targets so that when you play, you never know what youâ€™ll be coming across next. The ragdoll physics add a little bit of humor to the game as characters bounce and ragdoll in often amusing ways to, well, your hits. Ragdoll Hit was built for those short gaming sessions, and you can be caught up and ready to play within a few minutes.

If you have any questions about our Ragdoll Hit Unblocked game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Ragdoll Hit Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
